com.fujitsu.xml.xpointer.processor
Class XPointerException

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.lang.Throwable

              |
              +--java.lang.RuntimeException
                    |
                    +--com.fujitsu.xml.xpointer.processor.XPointerException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class XPointerException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException

Exception class related to XPointer.
This is used to report an error detected during XPointer analysis.
The following information about a detected error is provided:

  • Error type
    Error category defined with XPointer The following categories are defined:
    • Syntax error
    • Resource error
    • Subresource error
  • Error message

See Also:
